pullrequest.title: Fix joint visualization axis frame issue

content.raw:
Update as of edbaf45. 

- Joint visualization should be working properly for universal and revolute2 joints (see the left Cart Front Steer model below). 

- For the case where the joint `<xyz>` axis overlaps with one of the joint frame RGB axes, the partciular RGB axis's arrow head will be color coded (yellow)

 ![joint_vis.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1654257994-joint_vis.png)
content.html:
Update as of edbaf45.

  • Joint visualization should be working properly for universal and revolute2 joints (see the left Cart Front Steer model below).

  • For the case where the joint <xyz> axis overlaps with one of the joint frame RGB axes, the partciular RGB axis's arrow head will be color coded (yellow)
